column4: k does anyone know if the Nvidia Geforce4: MX 420 is still supported
there is no reason for it not to be supported
when i try and enable the driver it always boots to low-graphics mode
well in hardware drivers it shows that one is available
the -legacy driver package needs to be installed
I am not sure, it has been a while since I messed with my box that has an MX 440 in it
will there be anything i need to uninstall and after i install that what would i do
uninstall any other nvidia-glx packages that are already installed
none are, so after i install legacy drivers what do i do?
you might be able to use the driver enabling tool to enable it
well apparently nvidia-glx-legacy doesn't exist or has been obsoleted, and when i use the driver enabling tool it tells me it boots to low-graphics mode
if that doesn't work you can try installing the driver manually from the nvidia website (not a super-easy process) or find someone else to help you
